# Notes:
# 1) I like to disable warnings for when I knit html documents
# 2) I used my personal R package to create this.  You can download the package from my Github page with the devtools package.  devtools::install_github("https://github.com/mleary/learylib")

knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(learylib)

theme_set(theme_leary())
